text: beshak jis din (jange auhad mein) do jamaaten aapas mein guth gayeen us din jo log tum (musalamaanon) mein se bhaag khade hue (usakee vajah ye thee ki) unake baaz gunaahon (mukhaalafate rasool) kee vajah se shaitaan ne bahaka ke unake pov ukhaad die aur (usee vakt to) khuda ne zaroor unase daraguzar kee beshak khuda bada bakhshane vaala burdavaar hai
